Name: Chess Dungeons
About the game: Chess Dungeons is a Puzzle game that combines Chess mechanics and Sokoban-style gameplay for chess lovers and beginners. While featuring classic Chess gameplay, enjoy playing with models that give character to every single chess piece. Control your units and make sure you come out victorious. In classic Chess fashion, sometimes in order to advance, you must sacrifice your pieces to lure the enemy out and advance into the dungeon. Don't lose focus! Your goal is to slay the enemy's King. While other pieces can (and sometimes should!) be targeted, your main focus is to eliminate the King. A harder challenge! Don't just target the enemy King. Wipe out all of the black pieces!
